title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When switching between preferences pages that contain errors, a warning message is displayed instead of an error message.
EB: When switching between erroneous preferences pages, an error message should be displayed instead of a warning message.
SR:
1. Open the preferences page.
2. Navigate to a preferences page that contains errors.
3. Attempt to switch to another preferences page.
4. Observe the warning message that is displayed instead of an error message.
